promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic swan water-type pokemon with a regal tail. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or swan. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regalcyne, a a young basic swan water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Snowball. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "swan", "water" or "Regalcyne". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, swan-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: This elegant river dweller flutters gently, using its Snowball ability to make icy orbs. Often perceived as loyalty embodied, Regalcyne's regality prevails.
